game_description: Hone your disc throwing skills in challenging courses and relaxing environments. If you enjoy the demo, check out the full version here https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3659925840767901/
review_1: The only other disc golf game on the Oculus store so far is off the chains disc golf. This game knocks the pants off the competition with the realistic throwing physics. I found myself spending way too long at the driving range throwing drives. I play disc golf all the time and throwing a full power drive is surprisingly satisfying. My main complaint is the putting and forehand. There's some artificial vertical velocity added to your putts that make them go extremely far. I still have been unable to throw a successful forehand shot, it seems to go in a random direction each time. With some tuning for the putts and forehands this game could be amazing!
